# Digital Footprint for Software Engineers

> The definitive guide to building your online presence as a software engineer. Written by Vinit Shahdeo, a GitHub Star and engineering leader.

## About This Site

This is the official landing page for the book "Digital Footprint for Software Engineers" — a comprehensive 350+ page guide with 38 chapters across 11 sections covering everything from GitHub optimization to LinkedIn strategies, content creation, and landing jobs through your online presence.

## Author

**Vinit Shahdeo**
- Software Engineer & Engineering Leader
- GitHub Star & Open Source Mentor
- Experience: Developer platforms, fintech, AI-driven products, large-scale distributed systems
- Website: https://vinitshahdeo.com
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/vinitshahdeo
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/Vinit_Shahdeo
- Substack: https://vinitshahdeo.substack.com

## Book Overview

The book introduces the **3C Model** (Code, Content, Community) and the **FOOTPRINT Framework** for building a stellar digital presence. It provides practical, actionable advice for engineers who want their work to speak for itself — not growth hacking tactics.

### Key Topics Covered

1. **GitHub Mastery** — Advanced practices for standout profiles
2. **LinkedIn Strategies** — From essentials to advanced tactics for engineers
3. **Twitter & Social Platforms** — Going viral as a developer
4. **Visual Content & Video** — YouTube, Instagram Reels, short-form content
5. **Blogging, Newsletters & Portfolios** — Technical writing and audience growth
6. **Community & Open Source** — Hackathons, mentorship, structured programs
7. **The FOOTPRINT Framework** — Tools and playbooks for digital presence
8. **SEO & Google Visibility** — Be unmissable in search results
9. **Security, Privacy & Digital Hygiene** — Staying protected online
10. **AI & Digital Footprint** — Leveraging AI for your presence
11. **Landing Jobs** — Converting your footprint into career opportunities

## Site Structure

- `/` — Homepage with book overview, author info, and purchase options
- `#purchase` — Where to buy the book (Amazon, Flipkart)
- `#whats-inside` — Full table of contents and chapter coverage
- Footer contains contact info and social links
